events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product does not match the description and I want to request a refund immediately.
The case has been categorized under Refund as the customer requested a money back for a product not matching description.
An agent from the refund team has been assigned to handle this case to assist the customer in the refund process.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that your product did not meet expectations. I’m here to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a few photos of the product showing the issues you mentioned?
Here is my order number: 123456789. I attached photos showing the defect and how the product differs from what was described.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks for your help. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the refund.
Your refund request has been approved and is now being processed. You will receive confirmation once the payment is complete.
Just following up to confirm that the refund transaction has been completed. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As the refund has been successfully processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction, the case is now closed.
